mutants.code:
def calculate_max_sum_of_absolute_differences(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    (i, j) = (0, n - 1)
    result = []
    while i < j:
        result.append(arr[i])
        result.append(arr[j])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if i == j:
        result.append(arr[i])
    final_sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        final_sum += abs(result[i] - result[i - 1])
    final_sum -= abs(result[-1] - result[0])
    return final_sum

def calculate_max_sum_of_absolute_differences(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    (i, j) = (0, n - 1)
    result = []
    while i <= j:
        result.append(arr[i])
        result.append(arr[j])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if i == j:
        result.append(arr[i])
    final_sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        final_sum += abs(result[i] - result[i - 1])
    final_sum += abs(result[-1] - result[0])
    return final_sum

def calculate_max_sum_of_absolute_differences(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    (i, j) = (0, n - 1)
    result = []
    while i < j:
        result.append(arr[i])
        result.append(arr[j])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if i == j:
        result.append(arr[i])
    final_sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        final_sum += abs(result[i] - result[i - 2])
    final_sum += abs(result[-1] - result[0])
    return final_sum

def calculate_max_sum_of_absolute_differences(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    (i, j) = (0, n - 1)
    result = []
    while i < j:
        result.append(arr[i])
        result.append(arr[j])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if i == j:
        result.append(arr[i])
    final_sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        final_sum += abs(result[i] - result[i - 0])
    final_sum += abs(result[-1] - result[0])
    return final_sum

def calculate_max_sum_of_absolute_differences(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    (i, j) = (0, n - 1)
    result = []
    while i < j:
        result.append(arr[i])
        result.append(arr[j])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if i == j:
        result.append(arr[i])
    final_sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        final_sum += abs(result[i] - result[i - 0])
    final_sum += abs(result[-1] - result[0])
    return final_sum

def calculate_max_sum_of_absolute_differences(arr, n):
    arr = sorted(arr)
    (i, j) = (0, n - 1)
    result = []
    while i < j:
        result.append(arr[i])
        result.append(arr[j])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    if i == j:
        result.append(arr[i])
    final_sum = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        final_sum += abs(result[i] - result[i - -1])
    final_sum += abs(result[-1] - result[0])
    return final_sum
